elements.name: Check the selected currency displayed for the products' price

steps.name: User Navigates to Amazon Home Page
User Clicks on Language & Currency Setup page
User clicks on currency list picker and chooses "AED - Arab Emirates Dirham"

result.error_message:

steps.name: User clicks on save changes button
User should find currency symbol "AED" be displayed beside products price at Today Deals page

elements.name: Check filter by department in Deals and Promotions page

steps.name: User Navigates to Amazon Home Page
The selected "Software" filter shall be checked
